nodes.text: The Peacehawk was a starship that served in the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire. After saving the life of Captain Strayit of the Marshall Awe, Lieutenant Zertik Strom was promoted to First Officer of the Peacehawk, serving under General Ulric Tagge. Whilst on the Peacehawk, Strom served Tagge brilliantly and he was eventually promoted to commanding his own patrol fleet guarding the Wheel space station.

The Peacehawk was first mentioned in the second part of Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel, an article released on the StarWars.com blog in 2013 and written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley. The article does not make clear if the ship was active during the Rebellion era or the Rise of the Empire era or if Tagge actually captained the vessel or simply commanded it as part of a fleet.
